Description:
Detects usage of Gpg4win to encrypt files

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: File Encryption Using Gpg4win
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '% -c %' and command like '%passphrase%') and ((process_path like '%\gpg.exe' or process_path like '%\gpg2.exe') and description = 'gnupgâ€™s openpgp tool'))
